Title: Teaser text
Make a text-based game: You are in a maze of twisty little passages...

Title: Description
Make a text-based game: Make a game that just has text on screen to explain your surroundings. The player should have multiple choices to progress to the next stage. Make sure there is a “start” and an “end” and try to incorporate multiple different endings.

Title: Resources
Make a text-based game:
Create text based games without using code: 
https://twinery.org/ 
https://www.inklestudios.com/inklewriter/ 
Other tools for interactive fiction: https://itsfoss.com/create-interactive-fiction/
